author: Kleppten

changelog.release_notes:
ToiletFinder shows you the direction, distance and street address of the nearest public toilet within a square mile around your current position. It displays also if the toilet is accessible to wheelchair drivers. 

As you move towards the station it recalculates the distance. 

The app relies on Open Street Map Data. So if you find insufficient or incorrect information please go to openstreetmap.org to correct this for you and future users. Please help to keep public location data free and donate to http://donate.openstreetmap.org/
